root.name: Ozzy Versus the Universe - Part I: Demons of Topaz
root.description: The game involves the protagonist, known as Ozzy, being forced to land on a planet after his spaceship runs out of fuel. The aim of the game is to search the levels for diamonds to use as fuel and return them to Ozzy's ship. Ozzy is equipped with a boomerang which he can use to defeat aliens he may encounter along his search and he can explore underground areas with a limited air supply, which instantly refills when he reaches the surface again. Ozzy will die if he hits an enemy or hazard, falls from a great height or runs out of air while underground and once he runs out of lives the game is over.
